name: Who's your Santa !?
description: The game is the puzzle that will wreck a couple of your brain cells! The game that will test your maddest fantasies. If you’ll finish it on the first try, you should then ask yourself: “Am I alright?” The game after finishing which you’ll need 5 years of enhanced therapy. And us too, btw.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
